work.name: GenAI, Meta
highlights: Trained LLMs to (1) prevent generation of images of Public Figures on Meta AI by 70% (relative) with 0.01% increase in false refusals. (2) reduce the generation of images with stereotypical clothing on Meta AI from 53% to 3%.

work.name: Alexa AI, Amazon
highlights: Finetuned and evaluated a 100B LLM to call 1000+ APIs.

Led a team of scientists and engineers to build a personalized search system (retrieval and ranking) for query rewriting which serves millions of customers with <50ms latency. This contributes >50M in annual revenue.

Built a graph-based recommender system over a large graph with billions of edges. Designed a scalable graph data structure to keep the full graph in memory. This led to a 38% relative reduction in customer facing errors on Alexa.
